spec_data.Name: php-pdb
spec_data.Description:
PHP-PDB is a set of PHP classes that manipulate Palm OS databases. It lets you
read, write, alter, and easily use data that is meant to be sent to or
retrieved from a handheld.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:32:04 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: PHP classes for manipulating Palm OS databases
